document_data.caption: ''The beautiful and aloof mermaid, lounging in her fishbowl.''
document_data.name: Palasha
document_data.mainbody:
'''Palasha''' was a [[mermaid]] who traveled with the [[Witchlight Carnival]] in its journeys across the [[Feywild]] and the planes beyond.

{{Quote|We are an impossibility in an impossible universe.|Palasha, speaking about the Witchlight Carnival.}}
document_data.Personality: The mesmerizing mermaid sought to bring joy and beauty to the world through her singing. While she was seen as haughty and demanding, Palasha merely did not warm to others easily and had trouble showing genuine emotions. She had the bad habit of snapping her fingers at others when she desired something from them.
document_data.Abilities:
[[File:Bili, Palasha.png|thumb|right|300px|''Palasha meeting [[Billi Sharpe]], from the world of [[Toril]].]]
Palasha had the unique ability to ''[[control water|shape the form of water]]'' by means of her operatic, singing voice. 

Once per day, she could summon a swarm of [[kipper]]s and control them for up to a minute's time.
document_data.Activities: She spent much of her time lounging in a giant fishbowl by the [[Witchlight Carnival#Silversong Lake|Silversong Lake]] area of the carnival.
document_data.Relationships: Palasha was wholly in love with [[Candlefoot]], the Witchlight Carnivals resident mime.
